SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT REVIEW_ID reviewId, SHOW_NAME showNo, USER_NO userNo, REVIEW_SCORE reviewScore, R.CREATE_DATE createDate FROM REVIEW R JOIN SHOW S USING(SHOW_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT R.SHOW_NO, SHOW_NAME, PRICE, SHOW_START FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SHOW S ON(R.SHOW_NO = S.SHOW_NO) WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COUPON WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' AND EXPIRED_DATE>SYSDATE
SELECT COUPON_NO, COUPON_NAME, DISCOUNT, EXPIRED_DATE, GENRE_NAME genreNo FROM COUPON JOIN GENRE USING(GENRE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' AND EXPIRED_DATE>SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENTS P JOIN RESERVATION R USING(RESERVATION_ID) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND P.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PAYMENT_ID, SHOW_NAME, PAYMENT_METHOD, P.PRICE, PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENTS P JOIN RESERVATION R USING(RESERVATION_ID) JOIN SHOW S ON(R.SHOW_NO = S.SHOW_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RESERVATION_ID, TICKET_ID, SE.SEAT_ID, SHOW_NAME, R.ROUND_ID, ROW_NAME, COL_NO, H.HALL_NAME, RE.REGION_NAME, G.GENRE_NAME, PRICE, CREATEDATE, POSTER_ORIGINNAME FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SHOW S USING(SHOW_NO) JOIN HALL H ON(H.HALL_NO=S.HALL_NO) JOIN REGION RE USING(REGION_NO) JOIN GENRE G USING(GENRE_NO) JOIN TICKET T USING(RESERVATION_ID) JOIN SEATS SE ON(SE.SEAT_ID=T.SEAT_ID) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT J.CHAT_NO chatNo, CHAT_TITLE chatTitle, C.USER_NO userNo, M.USER_ID userId, CHAT_USER_COUNT chatUserCount, CREATEDATE createDate, COUNT(J.USER_NO) joinCount FROM CHAT_JOIN J JOIN CHAT C ON(J.CHAT_NO = C.CHAT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND J.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY J.CHAT_NO, CHAT_TITLE, C.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, CHAT_USER_COUNT, CREATEDATE ORDER BY CREATEDATE

SELECT C.CHAT_NO chatNo, CHAT_TITLE chatTitle, C.USER_NO userNo, M.USER_ID userId, CHAT_USER_COUNT chatUserCount, CREATEDATE createDate, COUNT(J.USER_NO) joinCount FROM CHAT C JOIN CHAT_JOIN J ON(J.CHAT_NO = C.CHAT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY C.CHAT_NO, CHAT_TITLE, C.USER_NO, M.USER_ID, CHAT_USER_COUNT, CREATEDATE ORDER BY CREATEDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEETING_JOIN J JOIN MEETING M ON(M.MEETING_NO=J.MEETING_NO) WHERE J.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND MEETING_DATE >= SYSDATE

SELECT M.MEETING_NO meetingNo, M.USER_NO userNo, E.USER_ID userId, MEETING_TITLE meetingTitle, SHOW_NAME showName, MEETING_PLACE meetingPlace, MEETING_COUNT meetingCount, MEETING_DATE meetingDate, START_DATE startDate, END_DATE endDate, COUNT(J.USER_NO) joinCount FROM MEETING M JOIN MEETING_JOIN J ON(M.MEETING_NO=J.MEETING_NO) JOIN SHOW S ON(S.SHOW_NO = M.SHOW_NO) JOIN MEMBER E ON(M.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND J.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND MEETING_DATE >= SYSDATE GROUP BY M.MEETING_NO, M.USER_NO, E.USER_ID, MEETING_TITLE, SHOW_NAME, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_COUNT, MEETING_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE ORDER BY MEETING_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEETING WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND MEETING_DATE >= SYSDATE

SELECT M.MEETING_NO meetingNo, M.USER_NO userNo, E.USER_ID userId, MEETING_TITLE meetingTitle, SHOW_NAME showName, MEETING_PLACE meetingPlace, MEETING_COUNT meetingCount, MEETING_DATE meetingDate, START_DATE startDate, END_DATE endDate, COUNT(J.USER_NO) joinCount FROM MEETING M JOIN MEETING_JOIN J ON(M.MEETING_NO=J.MEETING_NO) JOIN SHOW S ON(S.SHOW_NO = M.SHOW_NO) JOIN MEMBER E ON(M.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND MEETING_DATE >= SYSDATE GROUP BY M.MEETING_NO, M.USER_NO, E.USER_ID, MEETING_TITLE, SHOW_NAME, MEETING_PLACE, MEETING_COUNT, MEETING_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE ORDER BY MEETING_DATE
